primitiveValues.textValue: Mobile Web Version External wallet AUT

ConversationMessageDefinition.label: Mobile Web Version External wallet AUT

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
{!$Constants.Title}: {!$Constants.Url}

To withdraw cryptocurrency from your Ndax account using the mobile web website, follow these steps:

  1. Tap the Ndax logo in the top left-hand corner.
  2. Select Wallet from the dropdown menu.
  3. Select the cryptocurrency you want to withdraw.
  4. Tap the green up arrow (SEND) at the bottom of the screen.
  5. Choose the network you’d like to use.
  6. Enter the destination wallet address and the amount you want to send.
  7. If you are withdrawing XRP, XLM, EOS, LUNC, or Hedera, enter the required destination tag or memo ID.

⚠️ Important:
If a destination tag or memo is required, you must include it.
Failing to do so may result in a loss of funds or significant delays in processing your withdrawal.
Only check the ‘No Memo’ box if you are withdrawing to a private wallet that does not require one.
Most exchanges do require a destination tag or memo.

  1. Read and agree to the disclaimer, then tap Send.
  2. Enter the six-digit 2FA code from your authenticator app.
  3. Confirm your withdrawal by clicking the confirmation link sent to your email.
